name: Bright
description:
A platform puzzle game of how to use lights and colours to brighten your day - and move from the deepest darkness to the brightest of light. 

Plays best in 16:9 format.

Control info:
Move left and right with <a> or <d>. 
Jump with <w> or <space>. 
Pick up fireflies.
Use right mouse button to summon all captured fireflies, left click to choose one, then hold left button to paint.

Enjoy the light.
